H0.text: Chemical energy is produced when a rubber band vibrates.

H1.text: Light is the form of energy produced when a rubber band vibrates.

H2.text: Electrical energy is produced when a rubber band vibrates.

H3.text: Sound is the form of energy produced when a rubber band vibrates.

A4.text: Sound is propagated by progressive longitudinal vibratory disturbances (sound waves).
